app.report_reason_question: What is the reason for your report?
app.problem_description_question: Can you provide details about this issue?
app.problem_description_hint: Explain in more detail about the problem so we can better understand your issue!
app.priority_level_subtitle: Select the urgency level of your report so we can prioritize handling according to the impact of the issue!
app.attach_file_subtitle: Attach screenshots, images, or related documents to help us understand your issue better!
app.additional_info_subtitle: Add additional details that might help us understand the issue or your request!
app.report_success_title: Your Report Has Been Successfully Submitted
app.report_success_description: Thank you for your report. The report has been recorded, we will follow it up according to the procedure within the specified time. Please track report progress through the Service Status Check menu.
